data.text: Bunmi Oguntoye is a graduate of Accounting from Ahmadu Bello University. He is a Fellow of both the Institute of Chartered Accountants of Nigeria (ICAN) and Institute of Capital Market Registrars (ICMR) as well as Associate of Chartered Institute of Taxation of Nigeria (CITN).

He started his career with The Guardian Press Ltd as Senior Accounts Supervisor in 1991 and left in 1993 to join Atiba Iyalamu Savings and Loans Ltd as Banking Officer where he rose to Branch Deputy Manager in 1997 before his employment in Trade bank Plc to set up the Registrars Unit of the Bank. He eventually left Trade Bank Plc in 2006 in Post Bank recapitalization era to join Meristem Registrars Ltd as Registrars/CEO until 2009. In 2009, Bunmi worked briefly as Senior Manager with the Institute of Capital Market Registrars (ICMR) before taking appointment in First Registrars Nigeria Ltd in the same year.
He has attended many Leadership, Managerial and Professional Training programmes and he is currently the Head, Operations Division.
